ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We acknowledge loans or access to specimens granted by the following institutions: Auburn University, California Academy of Sciences, California Museum of Vertebrate Zoology, Carnegie Museum of Natural History, Cornell University Museum of Vertebrates, Field Museum of Natural History, Harvard Museum of Comparative Zoology, Milwaukee Public Museum, Natural History Museum of Los Angeles County, North Carolina Museum of Natural Sciences, Royal Alberta Museum, Redpath Museum McGill University, San Diego Natural History Museum, Smithsonian Museum of Natural History, University of Alberta, University of Puget Sound Museum of Natural History, and Yale Peabody Museum. We also thank three anonymous reviewers for helpful comments on this manuscript. This work was supported in part by National Science Foundation grant BCS 1026841 to LJR.
